testimonial.content: Findhope has my Heart!. I was connected to a peer counselor almost instantly and she helped me open up emotions that I have buried myself in.
testimonial.name: Anjali

testimonial.content: Frankly I wanted to check if this is legit or not even though I didn't have any issues. But turns out that findhope is very real and counseling has helped me get clarity over life that I didn't knew existed before.
testimonial.name: Priya

testimonial.content: I was feeling lonely not because I had no friends but because I didnt know who will take my problems seriously. findhope's peer counselor helped me deal with this feeling
testimonial.name: Supriya
